statements: SELECT * FROM visitor_access_permissions;
SELECT visitor_name, permission_level FROM visitor_access_permissions;
SELECT access_area FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT visitor_name FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE access_area = 'Lobby';
SELECT * FROM visitor_access_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, access_area FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE access_area = 'Admin' ORDER BY visitor_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_area FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE permission_level < 3;
SELECT visitor_name, permission_level FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE visitor_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, permission_level FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE permission_level = (SELECT MAX(permission_level) FROM visitor_access_permissions);
SELECT * FROM secure_areas WHERE access_level_required > 2;
SELECT area_name, access_level_required FROM secure_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT visitor_id, permission_level FROM visitor_permissions;
SELECT * FROM secure_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, access_level_required FROM secure_areas WHERE access_level_required < 2;
SELECT * FROM visitor_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT visitor_id, permission_level FROM visitor_permissions WHERE visitor_id = 3;
SELECT area_name, access_level_required FROM secure_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM secure_areas WHERE access_level_required <= 3;
SELECT visitor_id, permission_level, area_name, access_level_required FROM visitor_permissions INNER JOIN secure_areas ON visitor_permissions.permission_level >= secure_areas.access_level_required;
SELECT * FROM visitors_access
SELECT visitor_name, access_level FROM visitors_access
SELECT * FROM visitors_access WHERE access_level > 2
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM visitors_access ORDER BY visitor_name ASC
SELECT MAX(access_level) FROM visitors_access
SELECT * FROM visitors_access WHERE access_level > 1 ORDER BY visitor_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT visitor_name, access_level FROM visitors_access WHERE visitor_id = 2
SELECT visitor_name, access_level FROM visitors_access WHERE visitor_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT visitor_name, access_level FROM visitors_access WHERE access_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY access_level ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visitors FROM visitors_access
SELECT * FROM visitor_access_permissions;
SELECT visitor_name, access_level FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT visitor_id, secure_area FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE secure_area = 'Admin Area';
SELECT area_name, security_level FROM secure_areas ORDER BY security_level DESC;
SELECT log_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM visitor_logs WHERE visitor_id = 123;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM visitor_access_permissions ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, security_level FROM secure_areas WHERE security_level > 3;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, secure_area FROM visitor_access_permissions WHERE access_level >= 2 AND secure_area = 'Admin Area';
SELECT log_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM visitor_logs WHERE visitor_id = 101 ORDER BY entry_time ASC;
SELECT admin_name, admin_role FROM admins WHERE admin_role = 'Super Admin';
SELECT * FROM visitors;
SELECT name, access_level FROM visitors WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, access_time FROM visitor_access WHERE visitor_id = 1001;
SELECT visitor_id, area_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE access_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM visitors WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT name, access_level FROM visitors WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT v.name, a.area_name, va.access_time FROM visitors v JOIN visitor_access va ON v.visitor_id = va.visitor_id JOIN areas a ON va.area_id = a.area_id;
SELECT v.name, a.area_name, al.access_time FROM visitors v JOIN access_logs al ON v.visitor_id = al.visitor_id JOIN areas a ON al.area_id = a.area_id WHERE al.access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT v.name, ar.role_name FROM visitors v JOIN security_roles ar ON v.access_level = ar.role_id;
